Hi ğŸ‘‹, Welcome to the gatsby-starter-fresh theme. Hope you like this theme and use it for your personal blog! The blog has the following features:

  • Built with GatsbyJS
  • Blazing fast loading times
  • Uses the fresh theme
  • Mobile Friendly
  • High quality code (A)
  • Component seperated code
  • SEO Friendly
  • Google Analytics
  • In-built contact form powered by Formspree
  • Markdown support for new posts
  • Code syntax highlighting
  • Disqus support for comments
  • Supports PWA
  • Social Media icons
